snippet: South Korea’s government has reportedly decided to block the export of millions of tear gas shells to Bahrain, after months of pressure by human rights groups.
abstract: South Korea’s government has reportedly decided to block the export of millions of tear gas shells to Bahrain, after months of pressure by human rights groups.

byline.original: By ROBERT MACKEY and CHOE SANG-HUN

headline.main: Sale of Tear Gas to Bahrain Blocked Over Concerns Raised by Rights Groups

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
